attributes.action: Remove parking charging on car parks in the UK
attributes.additional_details: With covid spreading so fast why are we having to touch parking meters to buy a ticket? In the first lockdown most were covered up to stop the spread!
attributes.background: Remove parking fees to stop the spread of Covid-19

rejection.details:
Decisions about parking charges are a matter for individual local authorities and private car park operators, not the Government or House of Commons.

You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cap local authority parking fines during the pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555464

Stop local council parking enforcement teams from working during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567370
